content: LAU Hoong Chuin | SMU Faculty Directory showSidebars == showTitleBreadcrumbs == 1 node.field_disable_title_breadcrumbs.value == Faculty Profile LAU Hoong Chuin(On Leave) Full-time Faculty Professor of Computer Science School of Computing and Information Systems SCIS Research StatementFaculty Homepage Qualification PhD, Tokyo Institute of Technology, 1996 Teaching Topics Computational Thinking Algorithms and Optimization Design and Implementation of Algorithms AI Planning and Decision Making Advanced Topics in Intelligent Systems Research Advisor/Co-Research Advisor to Kenji LEONG Kah Hoe Joel LIM NGUYEN Minh Anh +65 68280229 hclau@smu.edu.sg Curriculum Vitae Research Areas and Areas of Expertise School of Computing and Information SystemsArtificial Intelligence and Data ScienceDecision Making & OptimizationMachine Learning & IntelligenceUrban & SustainabilityUrban Mobility & Smart EnvironmentUrban Logistics & SustainabilityHomeland SecurityHealth & WellbeingAgeing & Mental Health Strategic Priorities Sustainable Living Urban Logistics: Collaborative Urban Delivery Optimisation
